usefulItems: large bowl, square baking dish (25 cm x 25 cm x 5 cm), oven
title: Sweet Potato Spoon Bread

ingredients.content: 1 Tbsp unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
225 g cornmeal, medium, plus extra for dusting

preparations.content: Place sweet potato and 30 g water in mixing bowl, cook <b>12 min/100°C/speed 1<b>, then mash <b>6 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Rinse mixing bowl.
Preheat oven to 220°C. Grease a square baking dish (5 cm x 25 cm x 5 cm) and dust with cornmeal.
Place cornmeal, 450 g water, butter, sugar and salt in mixing bowl then boil <b>8 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.

Add egg yolks, reserved sweet potato mash, buttermilk, honey, cloves, cumin, white pepper, cayenne pepper and bicarbonate of soda then mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then mix again <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside. Thoroughly clean and dry mixing bowl.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place egg whites in mixing bowl and, without setting a time, whip <b>speed 4<b> until soft peaks form. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>.
Gently fold whipped egg whites into sweet potato mixture. Transfer to prepared baking dish and bake for 35-40 minutes (220°C) until lightly browned, puffed and set.

hintsAndTricks: Recipe inspired from the Hominy Grill restaurant in Charleston.
